sentences.sentence: This is not only because of the sparsity of the fringed.
sentences.translation: 这不仅是由于条纹稀疏。

sentences.sentence: Whole sparsity and local sparsity are proposed aiming at the sparsity of SAR images.
sentences.translation: 并针对SAR图像的稀疏性，提出了整体稀疏性与局部稀疏性的概念。

sentences.sentence: The studio hopes this sparsity will add to the intrigue of the copper box and its reflective surfaces.
sentences.translation: 工作室希望营造出的空旷感衬托铜色的盒式空间，加强空间的质感。
